original_text: Jesus was speaking about God's Spirit, who would come to people some time after that. Those people who believed in Jesus would receive God's Spirit at that later time. But God had not yet given his Spirit to people, because he had not yet raised Jesus back up to heaven.
korean_text: 이는 그를 믿는 자들이 받을 성령을 가리켜 말씀하신 것이라 (예수께서 아직 영광을 받지 않으셨으므로 성령이 아직 그들에게 계시지 아니하시더라)

sentences.original_text: Jesus was speaking about God's Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 하나님의 영에 대해 말씀하고 계셨다

sentences.original_text: Those people who believed in Jesus
But God had not yet given his Spirit to people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 아직 사람들에게 자신의 영을 주시지 않았다

sentences.original_text: because he had not yet raised Jesus back up to heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 아직 예수님을 하늘로 올리지 않았기 때문이다
